summary: Relating to Seattle parks; providing the Superintendent of Parks and Recreation an additional method for enforcing the Parks Code, the Seattle Municipal Code, and other laws; authorizing administrative suspension of park use by individuals who violate laws and rules in the parks; authorizing hearings on those suspensions; redefining the crime of trespass in parks; establishing the punishment therefor; and amending, repealing and adding section to Chapter 18.12 of the Seattle Municipal Code.
note: Common names: Parks Enforcement Ordinance; Enhanced Enforcement Ordinance; Parks Exclusion Ordinance
